name: barbaro.unity3d.auto
description:
This package provides [Auto], [AutoParent] and [AutoChildren] attributes. 
Using those attributes, one can finally never again write a GetComponent line in an Awake function. 
Using auto, getting your components is as simple as preprending the appropriate [Auto*] field to your variable declarations. 
Auto can be used with all access modifiers (private, protected, public), and all types (Unity components and custom monobehaviours). [AutoParent] and [AutoChildren] It can be used to get a single component, or get all the components. Multiple components can be returned as both an array, or a List. The variable type is inferred 
Here are a couple of examples: [Auto] public Rigidbody myRb; [AutoParent] protected Collider[] myParentsColliders; [AutoChildren] private CustomScript scriptInOneOfChildren;
